## üîß Technology Stack

### Backend (Laravel)
- **Laravel 11 Docs:** https://laravel.com/docs/11.x
- **Filament 4 Docs:** https://filamentphp.com/docs/4.x
- **Laravel Sanctum:** https://laravel.com/docs/11.x/sanctum
- **Eloquent ORM:** https://laravel.com/docs/11.x/eloquent
- **Laravel Forge:** https://forge.laravel.com/docs

### Frontend (Next.js)
- **Next.js 16 Docs:** https://nextjs.org/docs
- **React 19 Docs:** https://react.dev
- **TypeScript:** https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs
- **Tailwind CSS v4:** https://tailwindcss.com/docs
- **TanStack Query:** https://tanstack.com/query/latest/docs
- **NextAuth.js:** https://next-auth.js.org/getting-started/introduction
- **React Hook Form:** https://react-hook-form.com/get-started
- **Zod:** https://zod.dev

### Deployment
- **Vercel Docs:** https://vercel.com/docs
- **Laravel Forge:** https://forge.laravel.com

## üõ†Ô∏è Development Tools

### Required Software
- **PHP 8.2+:** https://www.php.net/downloads
- **Composer:** https://getcomposer.org/download
- **Node.js 20+:** https://nodejs.org
- **Git:** https://git-scm.com/downloads

### Recommended IDE
- **VS Code:** https://code.visualstudio.com
- **VS Code Extensions:** See `.vscode/extensions.json`

### Useful Tools
- **Postman:** https://www.postman.com - API testing
- **TablePlus:** https://tableplus.com - Database GUI
- **Ray:** https://myray.app - Laravel debugging
- **Laragon:** https://laragon.org - Local server (Windows)

## üöÄ Deployment

### Hosting Platforms
- **Laravel Forge:** https://forge.laravel.com - Laravel hosting
- **Vercel:** https://vercel.com - Next.js hosting
- **DigitalOcean:** https://www.digitalocean.com - VPS hosting
- **AWS:** https://aws.amazon.com - Cloud hosting

### Database Hosting
- **PlanetScale:** https://planetscale.com - MySQL hosting
- **Supabase:** https://supabase.com - PostgreSQL hosting
- **AWS RDS:** https://aws.amazon.com/rds - Managed databases

### Email Services
- **Mailgun:** https://www.mailgun.com
- **SendGrid:** https://sendgrid.com
- **Amazon SES:** https://aws.amazon.com/ses
- **Postmark:** https://postmarkapp.com

### File Storage
- **AWS S3:** https://aws.amazon.com/s3
- **Cloudflare R2:** https://www.cloudflare.com/products/r2
- **DigitalOcean Spaces:** https://www.digitalocean.com/products/spaces

## üìä Monitoring & Analytics

### Application Monitoring
- **Sentry:** https://sentry.io - Error tracking

### Analytics
- **Google Analytics:** https://analytics.google.com
- **Plausible:** https://plausible.io - Privacy-friendly analytics
- **Fathom:** https://usefathom.com - Simple analytics

### Uptime Monitoring
- **Oh Dear:** https://ohdear.app
- **UptimeRobot:** https://uptimerobot.com
- **Pingdom:** https://www.pingdom.com
